member.name: WS_UNIQUE_ID_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: An optional type description used with to specify constraints on the set of values which can be deserialized.

member.name: WS_UNIQUE_ID_DESCRIPTION.minCharCount
member.summary: The minimum number of characters. This only pertains to the case where the unique ID is represented as a string.

member.name: WS_UNIQUE_ID_DESCRIPTION.maxCharCount
member.summary: The maximum number of characters. This only pertains to the case where the unique ID is represented as a string.
